articles.title: 200 million year-old jawbone revealed as new species - BBC
articles.description: The newly discovered flying reptile is the oldest pterosaur in North America.
articles.content:
Victoria GillScience correspondent, BBC News
The new pterosaur has been named Eotephradactylus mcintireae, meaning 'ash-winged dawn goddess'

articles.title: Tesla stock tanks after Trump dismisses Musk’s new political party plan and calls him ‘off the rails’ - CNN
articles.description: Shares in Tesla tanked by as much as 7.6% in premarket trading Monday after its CEO Elon Musk said he is forming a new American political party, provoking an irate response from US President Donald Trump.

articles.title: American kids have become increasingly unhealthy over nearly two decades, new study finds - AP News
articles.description: A new study shows that the health of U.S. children has deteriorated over the past 17 years, with kids today more likely to experience obesity, chronic diseases and other problems. The research was published Monday in the Journal of the American Medical Associ…
articles.content:
The health of U.S. children has deteriorated over the past 17 years, with kids today more likely to have obesity, chronic diseases and mental health problems like depression, a new study says.

articles.author: Rafael Nam
articles.title: Why some see the dollar's drop as a sign America is losing its financial might - NPR
articles.description: The dollar has just posted its worst first-half of a year since 1973. And now investors wonder — is it a sign that America is losing its financial standing?
articles.content:
There's perhaps no better symbolic representation of America's financial might than the U.S. dollar. And right now, the world's top currency is taking a big, mighty punch.
